page.title: 14MEDIA IN DUMFRIES (cont)
page.content: SOLWAY REPORT consists of news,weather shipping forecasts and interviews with people that are taking part in forthcoming events.On a Monday the lunchtime programme is called"SCOTTISH CHOICE"which envolves the playing of Scottish music.On a Tuesday it is called"COUNTRY MATTERS"this is where they talk about rural affairs.On a Wednesday it is called"AROUND SOLWAY" which is a a portrait of a town or a village in Dumfries & Galloway.Thursdays programme is called "LUNCH BREAK"which is a womans magazine and on a Friday it is called "FRIDAY CALLOUT"on this programme they play music and read out dedications.
